subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Dick Pound, chairman of the World Anti-Doping Agency, said yesterday that a Dutch investigator's report clearing Lance Armstrong from doping allegations made by a French newspaper was full of holes.
snippet: Dick Pound, chairman of the World Anti-Doping Agency, said yesterday that a Dutch investigator's report clearing Lance Armstrong from doping allegations made by a French newspaper was full of holes.
